Reviews.Content: nice B Nice clean hotel that is 10 mins walk NW from the Rail Stn. Disadvantage was it is by the main road on the ground floor but that was not a problem. Breakfast was not included. The manager said it was the way they classify the hotel. BB being one step down from 2 star.
Reviews.Author: BBird1955

Reviews.Content: fromMadrid their own description is absolutely an idealisation... their street has high traffic, so in a ground floor you can hope only a noisy and v i b r a t i o n room, so for this big inconvenience the price is not a bargain... Meanwhile the manager who received us, Mili, was very nice and kind with us. We had paid 2 night as advance and we waisted all because we didn麓t stay not even one night
Reviews.Author: fromMadriz

Reviews.Content: Don't believe what you read This Bed and Breakfast is awful, OK, so we booked it through a budget site, but the description it gives itself is miles from the truth. Its at least a half hour trek to anywhere near town, the BB itself is in someones flat, which is on the main carriage way in the bad end of town. It advertises parking but there isn't any, unless you cross the main road, go over the dual carriage way (dangerous), over several crossings and down a really rough street to find a public parking spot. They speak no English, the family seem to be living there in amongst everything and the en suites constist of a shower head over the toilet. We did a runner after just one night instead of the three we booked but we had to pay to escape. Awful, awful, don't go there even if you're a budget traveller, you can get good last minute deals for the same price, if not cheaper at much better hotels, like La Gioconda.
Reviews.Author: jennyshutts
